metadata.name: Dancer 1.01
metadata.description:
In movies that I make, I am sculpting in time. Like Tarkovsky who inspires me.

For the "Dancer Dots" digital art project, it was about scanning multiple portions of that time and then digging through that scan to find the best frame possible.

This frame was extracted from a LiDAR scanning session with Maya. It was then enhanced and color graded.

Maya is a contemporary dancer who explores the slow and the self. A constant and slow movement between the inside and the outside. Like a pendulum.

The core ideas of the project are:

- Show dance and movement differently, using technology.
- Giveback to the dancers and dance communities.
- As a collector, be an important part of a project (gifts, be a part of the creative process)
- Get enough funds to make a 3D animation short film with scanned dancers or collectors.
- Split the profits with everyone participating in this project (dancers, collectors, animators...etc.)

For more information, on this project: https://www.dancerdots.com/
